CustomField.description: Question Created by the Survey Builder
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select Option Below To Confirm Replacement for VBALX
CustomField.label: Replacement Option

value.fullName: Change to new Vanguard Fund List without VBALX - no fees apply -
value.label: Change to new Vanguard Fund List without VBALX - no fees apply -

value.fullName: Remove VBALX from current lineup and replace with fund - fee applies -
value.label: Remove VBALX from current lineup and replace with fund - fee applies -

value.fullName: Make no change and keep VBALX - transaction fees continue -
value.label: Make no change and keep VBALX - transaction fees continue -
